text: Mach, Jisasɨv sezɨrmen we Jerusalemɨŋ ahevɨkɨrorɨmŋgɨmar. Ahevɨkɨrorɨmŋgɨz Jisasɨv Yakŋ Ohɨrand marɨvai oram ohɨrand imbɨz unchaŋ ahevomar. Ahevohe osa anchɨ nsɨham nor ntɨŋ ŋaŋ ñɨmŋgɨmar han mach osa anchɨ hanɨhan uŋkɨ eŋgwamŋgɨmar hanez ondo ake kiaŋgwɨmar. Ave mbɨndɨŋ antɨm nsɨham nor enororɨnd mach ai esa sam haŋ ŋgarɨwi ikŋɨŋgwɨm uŋkɨ eŋgwamŋgɨj han ŋɨmbi akŋɨrɨzɨŋge pazɨmŋgamar.
